Current Question Text: Stool (fecal) test. A test for blood or abnormal DNA in your stool. This test is sometimes called a fecal occult blood test (a FOBT), or a fecal immunochemical test (FIT), a Stool DNA Test (CologuardÂ®). These tests should be done at home and the sample is mailed in.
